short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Follower info from Your Target Page in Instagram (Pure js/no API/no behind the scenes activities)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape followers (page id/page name) from any Instagram page "Your Page / Others Page"

Super Easy:
1.Open a page in Instagram Web
2.Open the page owner followers list
3.Click on the extension start button
-> All followers' name will be extracted and will be saved into your Downloads folder as a TXT file.

Completely FREE

A small part of Instagram Auto Activities Package (from v-User)
v-user.com/direct
